comment:
Thick, fruity, spicy.

Pepper, raisins, honey.

N- plumb, sherry, moonshine, oak
P- heavy sherry, dried fruits,cinnamon
F- plumb, oak, medium finish

Better nose than palate. 

Almond, vanilla and banana on the nose. There's wood on the palate with a touch of spice. Finish is weak and short.
Liquorice on the nose, spicy pallet and a swirling nutmeg finish. A little boozy at times.
Drinks by the dram. It is good. Kinda sweet, not too spicy. Nose like highland park 12, but not as refined a taste.
Lovely deep plum, with wood & as a hint of spice. The finish is sweet & rather quick, but a very tasty dram.

Notes of vanilla, honey, caramel, and dessert wine on the nose, with a hint of smoke and sea hiding at the end. The flavor is heavy on the sweet notes up front (caramel and toffee), with lingering vanilla at the end.
